Description: Limestone ostracon with text containing a memorandum of the property of a monastery.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.129, pl.89)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (112013) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/112013)
